string.name: name
string.value: Condition for Joining the Secret Organization 2
Will you be allowed to join the Secret Organization now? Talk to the #b#p1063018##k.

The #p1063018# says that you will be allowed to join the Secret Organization if you meet just one more condition. This time, he wants you bring him #b#t4000031#s#k from the #bZombie Lupins#k. You're not sure what they need it for but go ahead and get it for them.\r\n\r\n#i4000031# #t4000031# #b#c4000031# / 20#k
It looks like you'll be able to join the Secret Organization soon. For now just wait.
I don't think that was enough to get you into the secret organization, lifesaver. My master says he'll let you join if you fulfill one more request.
This is like a practice round before you join the organization. I'm sure it'll be simple for you. Now, let me tell you about this task.
The task requires you to find #b20 #t4000031#s#k. You'll find a lot of #r#o4230101#s#k in #b#m100040103##k, and all you have to do is acquire #t4000031#s from these monsters. I'll be waiting!
Oh, you've brought all the #t4000031#s! That was quite impressive! Let me go ask my master if you can now join the organization!
My master was too busy, so I couldn't ask. I'll ask him a little later so please wait a few moments.
It seems like you haven't acquired #b20 #t4000031#s#k yet. My master has said that you can find them easily by eliminating #r#o4230101#s#k in #m100040103#!
